summary: A 13 year old Gypsy boy escapes from foster home to continue a life of mischief and delinquency during a french summer.
cast: Marc Cortes|Raymond Adam|Tony Fourmann|Simon Abkarian|Magalie Contreras|Maéva Fertier|Sarah-Laure Estragnat|Mehdi Laribi|Emmanuel Adam|Alain Baudier|Marie Camacho|Ezaï Canlay|Joséphine Cantero|Ezzedine Chaouch|Auguste Cribel|Germaine Cribel|Nassera Daineche|Eugénie Fourmann|Raymond Gil|Ismaël Gorgan|Alain Huet|Anne Lévy|Nordine M'Dahoma|Sofiane Madjid Mammeri|Dimitri Mazzuchini|Mohamed Metina|Saïd Moali|Khalil Mohamed|Rémi Pedevilla|Joseph Piombino
title: Khamsa
